short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get accurate forecasts, personalized assistance & real-time updates in one extension. EWW, your ultimate weather companion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of the weather with Everywhere Weather. Accurate forecasts, personalized assistance, and real-time updates - all in one handy Chrome extension.

By clicking “ADD TO CHROME”, you accept and agree to install the Interesting Facts extension and setting Chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in our Terms of use and Privacy policy 

Privacy Policy: https://www.wecloudwise.com/privacypolicy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.wecloudwise.com/terms-of-use.html

You can always uninstall the extension,
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1. Go to "Settings" by clicking on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of 
     your Chrome browser
2. In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
3. From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall
